titleInfo.title: Jo bo rin po che dngul sku mched gsum rten dang brten par bcas pa'i dkar chag rab dga'i glu dbyangs / The extremely rare and hitherto unknown history of the Jobo of Khochar, one of the most holy images of Pu hrang, West Tibet, and its temple ...

originInfo.publisher: Tho ling gtsug lag khang lo gcig stong 'khor ba'i rjes dran mdzad sgo'i go sgrig tshogs chung
